text: This is a list of airports in Western Sahara, sorted by location. These airports are also included in the List of airports in Morocco. __TOC__ == Airports == Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled commercial airline service. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:95%" |- valign=baseline ! style="text-align:left; white-space:nowrap;" | City served ! style="text-align:left; white-space:nowrap;" | ICAO ! style="text-align:left; white-space:nowrap;" | IATA ! style="text-align:left; white-space:nowrap;" | Airport name ! style="text-align:left; white- space:nowrap;" | Coordinates |- valign=top | Dakhla (ad-Dakhla) | GSVO / GMMH | VIL | Dakhla Airport | |- valign=top | Laâyoune (El Aaiún) | GSAI / GMML | EUN | Hassan I Airport (Laâyoune Airport) | |- valign=top | Smara (Semara) | GSMA / GMMA | SMW | Smara Airport | |- valign=top | La Güera (La Gouera) | | ZLG | La Güera Airport (closed) | |} * Laayoun Annex Air Base (May be a section of Hassan I Airport GMML/EUN) There are other unpaved airstrips in Western Sahara: * Oum Dreyga Airport * a marked north-south runwayMoroccan Border Control at the Moroccan border control facilities south of Guerguerat. * one rough dirt airstripTifariti airstrip southwest of Tifariti * two well defined dirt airstripsAl Mahbes airstrip just west of Al Mahbes == See also == * Legal status of Western Sahara * List of airports in Morocco * Transport in Western Sahara * List of airports by ICAO code: G#Western Sahara * Wikipedia: WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Africa#Western Sahara (claimed by Morocco) == References == * * - includes IATA codes * World Aero Data: Western Sahara - ICAO codes, coordinates * Great Circle Mapper: Western Sahara - IATA and ICAO codes Western Sahara Airports Airports Western Sahara
title: List of airports in Western Sahara
